name: Caterpie
description:
Caterpie caterpillar adventure

If you are looking for an relaxing adventure in a stunning environment, this game might be just for you! :)

Story:

You slip into the role of a little  caterpillar and try to survive. But be cautious! Some bird might have an eye on you ;)

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys = Movement

Spacebar = Jump
